DocAttribute.Name: Literal
DocAttribute.Documentation: The text literal to be presented.

DocAttribute.Name: Placement
DocAttribute.Documentation: An _IfcAxis2Placement_ that determines the placement and orientation of the presented string. > When used with a text style based on IfcTextStyleWithBoxCharacteristics then the y-axis is taken as the reference direction for the box rotation angle and the box slant angle.

DocAttribute.Name: Path
DocAttribute.Documentation: The writing direction of the text literal.
